ReleaseNotes.Note: Experimental AQUA interfaces have been added. This is very much a work-in-progress experimentation and will be refined as the project progresses.

Experimental alignment editing and deleting functionality has been added to this release. When there is an alignment between a source composite token and a target token in another verse, highlighting the tokens only works if you shift-hover over the target token in the other verse. To create an alignment, click on the source token (composite or regular), then shift-click on the target token. You will need to shift-hover to see the newly added alignment. To delete an alignment, shift hover to find the alignment. You can delete the alignment form either the source or target token.
